snippet: The investment bank Lazard said its fourth-quarter earnings dropped 99 percent, as its core deal-making businesses took a hit.
abstract: The investment bank Lazard said its fourth-quarter earnings dropped 99 percent, as its core deal-making businesses took a hit.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and AZAM AHMED

headline.main: Lazard's Profit Plummeted in Fourth Quarter
headline.print_headline: Net Income At Lazard Plummets By 99%
